df-disj
blocks.content: A collection of classes ` B ( x ) ` is disjoint when for each element ` y ` , it is in ` B ( x ) ` for at most one ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.) (Revised by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: disjss2
blocks.content: If each element of a collection is contained in a disjoint collection, the original collection is also disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wi(wdisj(s0, c0, c2), wdisj(s0, c0, c1)))
} = {
  3imtr4g(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wdisj(s0, c0, c2), wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  alimdv(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wi(wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ssel(c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  rmoim(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)→(⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c2)→ ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
} = {
  3imtr4g(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c2), ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2)), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)))
  alimdv(hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), ∃*(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2), ∃*(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  syl(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), (∃*(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2)→ ∃*(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, c1 ⊆ c2, (hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2))
  ssel(c1, c2, hs0)
  rmoim(s0, c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c2)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: disjss1
blocks.content: A subset of a disjoint collection is disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjss1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wdisj(s0, c1, c2), wdisj(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3imtr4g(wss(c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c1, c2), wdisj(s0, c0, c2), wal(hs0, wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wal(hs0, wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  alimdv(hs0, wss(c0, c1), wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  moimdv(s0, wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  anim1d(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  ssel(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  dfdisj2(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  dfdisj2(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm disjss1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(⊔(s0 ∈ c1, c2)→ ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))

  alimdv(hs0, c0 ⊆ c1, ∃*(s0,(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)), ∃*(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)))

  dfdisj2(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  dfdisj2(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

thm cbvdisj(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s1, c0, c2)), diffss(s0, s1))
  3bitr4i(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s1, c0, c2), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  albii(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrmo(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  cbvrmo(s0, s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-disj(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvdisj(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)↔ ⊔(s1 ∈ c0, c2))
  ⊣ F/(s1, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)↔ ⊔(s1 ∈ c0, c2)), d(s0, s1))
  3bitr4i(⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ⊔(s1 ∈ c0, c2), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2)))
  albii(hs0, ∃*(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1), ∃*(s1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2))
  cbvrmo(s0, s1, c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq2d(hs0, c1, c2, s0 = s1)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-disj(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm nfdisj(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnf(s0, wdisj(s1, c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfxfr(s0, wdisj(s1, c0, c1), wal(hs0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  dfdisj2(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfal(s0, hs0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  mptru(wnf(s0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  nfmod2(s0, s1, wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nftru(s1)
  adantl(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  nfand(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfeld(s0, cv(s1), c0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  a1i(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, c0))
  a1i(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm nfdisj(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, ⊔(s1 ∈ c0, c1))

  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfxfr(s0, ⊔(s1 ∈ c0, c1), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))))
  dfdisj2(s1, hs0, c0, c1)

  nfmod2(s0, s1, wtru, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  nftru(s1)
  adantl(wtru, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  nfand(s0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), s1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfeld(s0, s1, c0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  a1i(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, c0))
  a1i(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)

thm disjor(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitr4i(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wral(s0, c0, wal(hs0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wal(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))), wal(hs0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  bitri(wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))), wal(hs0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c0, wal(hs0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  ralbii(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), wal(hs0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  3bitri(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), wal(hs0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wo(wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wn(wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  orcom(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))
  df-or(wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  bitr4i(wi(wn(wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(hs0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  imbi1i(wn(wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  bitri(wn(wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))))
  neq0(hs0, cin(c1, c2))
  exbii(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  19.23v(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ralcom4(s1, hs0, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  albii(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  rmo4(s0, s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))

blocks.name: disjors
blocks.content: Two ways to say that a collection ` B ( i ) ` for ` i e. A ` is disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjors(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(s1), c1), csb(s0, cv(s2), c1)), emptycls)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(s1), c1), csb(s0, cv(s2), c1)), emptycls)))), wdisj(s1, c0, csb(s0, cv(s1), c1)))
  cbvdisj(s0, s1, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(s1), c1))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  disjor(s1, s2, c0, csb(s0, cv(s1), c1), csb(s0, cv(s2), c1))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(s1), cv(s2), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, cv(s2), c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjors(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 = s2 ∨([s1 / s0]c1 ⋂[s2 / s0]c1)= ∅))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 = s2 ∨([s1 / s0]c1 ⋂[s2 / s0]c1)= ∅))), ⊔(s1 ∈ c0,[s1 / s0]c1))
  cbvdisj(s0, s1, c0, c1, [s1 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, s1, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, s1, c1)
  disjor(s1, s2, c0, [s1 / s0]c1, [s2 / s0]c1)
  csbeq1(s0, s1, s2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, s2, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, s1, c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: disji2
blocks.content: Property of a disjoint collection: if ` B ( X ) = C ` and ` B ( Y ) = D ` , and ` X =/= Y ` , then ` C ` and ` D ` are disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disji2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(c4, c5), emptycls))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c1, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  3impia(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c4, c5), emptycls))
  syl5bi(wa(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))), wne(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c4, c5), emptycls), wn(wceq(c2, c3)))
  df-ne(c2, c3)
  ord(wa(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c4, c5), emptycls))
  impcom(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c4, c5), emptycls)))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c4, c5), emptycls)), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))))
  disjors(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c4, c5), emptycls)), wo(wceq(c2, cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c4, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wceq(c2, cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c4, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))
  eqeq1d(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls, cin(c4, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  ineq1d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  csbhypf(hs0, s0, c2, c1, c4)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(c2, cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c4, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c4, c5), emptycls))
  eqeq2(cv(hs1), c3, c2)
  eqeq1d(cin(c4, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls, cin(c4, c5), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  ineq2d(c4, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), c5, wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  csbhypf(hs1, s0, c3, c1, c5)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c5)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wo(wceq(c2, cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c4, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.w(wo(wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c4, c5), emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm disji2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∧(c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0)∧ c2 ≠ c3)→(c4 ⋂ c5)= ∅)
  ⊣ (s0 = c2 → c1 = c4)
  ⊣ (s0 = c3 → c1 = c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  3impia(⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), c2 ≠ c3, (c4 ⋂ c5)= ∅)
  syl5bi((⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∧(c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0)), c2 ≠ c3, (c4 ⋂ c5)= ∅, ¬ c2 = c3)
  df-ne(c2, c3)
  ord((⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∧(c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0)), c2 = c3, (c4 ⋂ c5)= ∅)
  impcom(⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), (c2 = c3 ∨(c4 ⋂ c5)= ∅))
  syl5bi((c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (c2 = c3 ∨(c4 ⋂ c5)= ∅), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 = hs1 ∨([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅))))
  disjors(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c0, (hs0 = hs1 ∨([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅), (c2 = c3 ∨(c4 ⋂ c5)= ∅), (c2 = hs1 ∨(c4 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅))
  orbi12d(hs0 = c2, hs0 = hs1, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, c2 = hs1, (c4 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅)
  eqeq1(hs0, c2, hs1)
  eqeq1d(([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1), emptycls, (c4 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1), hs0 = c2)
  ineq1d([hs0 / s0]c1, [hs1 / s0]c1, c4, hs0 = c2)
  csbhypf(hs0, s0, c2, c1, c4)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  orbi12d(hs1 = c3, c2 = hs1, (c4 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, c2 = c3, (c4 ⋂ c5)= ∅)
  eqeq2(hs1, c3, c2)
  eqeq1d((c4 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1), emptycls, (c4 ⋂ c5), hs1 = c3)
  ineq2d(c4, [hs1 / s0]c1, c5, hs1 = c3)
  csbhypf(hs1, s0, c3, c1, c5)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c5)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 = hs1 ∨(c4 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅))
  diff.hs1.w((c2 = c3 ∨(c4 ⋂ c5)= ∅))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: disji
blocks.content: Property of a disjoint collection: if ` B ( X ) = C ` and ` B ( Y ) = D ` have a common element ` Z ` , then ` X = Y ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disji(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c4, c6))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c1, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  syl3an3(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c4, c6)), wceq(c2, c3), wne(cin(c5, c6), emptycls))
  inelcm(c4, c5, c6)
  3impia(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wne(cin(c5, c6), emptycls), wceq(c2, c3))
  necon1d(cin(c5, c6), emptycls, c2, c3, wa(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))))
  3expia(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c5, c6), emptycls))
  disji2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disji(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∧(c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0)∧(c4 ∈ c5 ∧ c4 ∈ c6))→ c2 = c3)
  ⊣ (s0 = c2 → c1 = c5)
  ⊣ (s0 = c3 → c1 = c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  syl3an3(⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), (c4 ∈ c5 ∧ c4 ∈ c6), c2 = c3, (c5 ⋂ c6)≠ ∅)
  inelcm(c4, c5, c6)
  3impia(⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), (c5 ⋂ c6)≠ ∅, c2 = c3)
  necon1d((c5 ⋂ c6), emptycls, c2, c3, (⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∧(c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0)))
  3expia(⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), c2 ≠ c3, (c5 ⋂ c6)= ∅)
  disji2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
}

blocks.name: invdisj
blocks.content: If there is a function ` C ( y ) ` such that ` C ( y ) = x ` for all ` y e. B ( x ) ` , then the sets ` B ( x ) ` for distinct ` x e. A ` are disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Dec-2016.)

thm invdisj(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))), wdisj(s0, c0, c1))

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylibr(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))), wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wal(s1, wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))))
  alrimi(s1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))), wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  nfra2(s1, s0, c0, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))), wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  sylbi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0))))))
  df-ral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0))))
  alimi(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  impd(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  imim2i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl6ib(wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c2, cv(s0)))
  rsp(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))
  eqcom(c2, cv(s0))
  mo2icl(s0, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  dfdisj2(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

thm invdisjrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  rgen2(s0, hs0, c0, crab(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0))), wceq(csb(s1, cv(hs0), c2), cv(s0)))

  simplbiim(wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(csb(s1, cv(hs0), c2), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(csb(s1, cv(hs0), c2), cv(s0)))
  elrabf(s1, cv(hs0), c1, wceq(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(csb(s1, cv(hs0), c2), cv(s0)))

  nfcsb1v(s1, cv(hs0), c2)

thm invdisjrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

thm disjiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  syl5bi(w3a(wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c0), wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls)), wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(ciun(s0, c2, c1), ciun(s0, c3, c1))))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: disjord
blocks.content: Conditions for a collection of sets ` A ( a ) ` for ` a e. V ` to be disjoint. (Contributed by AV, 9-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjord(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, c1)), diffsc(s2, c0))
  sylibr(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c0, c0, w0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))
  pm2.61i(wi(w0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  a1d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))
  orc(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))
  expcom(wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))
  olcd(wa(w0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls), wral(s2, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s2), c2))))
  ralrimiv(s2, c1, wa(w0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s2), c2)))
  impancom(w0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1), wn(wcel(cv(s2), c2)))
  con3d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  3expia(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  disj(s2, c1, c2)
  disjor(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.wn.s(s2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjord(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c2)→ s0 = s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), d(s2, c0))
  sylibr(w0, ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 = s1 ∨(c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c0, c0, w0, (s0 = s1 ∨(c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅))
  adantr(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), (s0 = s1 ∨(c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅))
  pm2.61i((w0 →(s0 = s1 ∨(c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅)), s0 = s1)
  a1d(s0 = s1, w0, (s0 = s1 ∨(c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅))
  orc(s0 = s1, (c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅)
  expcom(¬ s0 = s1, w0, (s0 = s1 ∨(c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅))
  olcd((w0 ∧ ¬ s0 = s1), s0 = s1, (c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅)
  sylibr((w0 ∧ ¬ s0 = s1), (c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅, ∀(s2 ∈ c1, ¬ s2 ∈ c2))
  ralrimiv(s2, c1, (w0 ∧ ¬ s0 = s1), ¬ s2 ∈ c2)
  impancom(w0, ¬ s0 = s1, s2 ∈ c1, ¬ s2 ∈ c2)
  con3d((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c1), s0 = s1, s2 ∈ c2)
  3expia(w0, s2 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2, s0 = s1)
  disj(s2, c1, c2)
  disjor(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, ¬ s0 = s1)
  diff.wn.s(s2, s0 = s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: disjiunb
blocks.content: Two ways to say that a collection of index unions ` C ( i , x ) ` for ` i e. A ` and ` x e. B ` is disjoint. (Contributed by AV, 9-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjiunb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wdisj(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s2, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cin(ciun(s1, c1, c2), ciun(s1, c3, c4)), emptycls)))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  disjor(s0, s2, c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2), ciun(s1, c3, c4))
  iuneq12d(s1, c1, c2, c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c3, c4)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s1, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjiunb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (⊔(s0 ∈ c0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 = s2 ∨(⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2)⋂ ⋃(s1 ∈ c3, c4))= ∅))))
  ⊣ (s0 = s2 → c1 = c3)
  ⊣ (s0 = s2 → c2 = c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  disjor(s0, s2, c0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2), ⋃(s1 ∈ c3, c4))
  iuneq12d(s1, c1, c2, c3, c4, s0 = s2)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c3, c4)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s1, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: disjiund
blocks.content: Conditions for a collection of index unions of sets ` A ( a , b ) ` for ` a e. V ` and ` b e. W ` to be disjoint. (Contributed by AV, 9-Jan-2022.)

thm disjiund(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(c3, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s4), c2), wcel(cv(s4), c4)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c5)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c3)
  -| diffsc(s4, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)

blocks.name: disjxiun
blocks.content: An indexed union of a disjoint collection of disjoint collections is disjoint if each component is disjoint, and the disjoint unions in the collection are also disjoint. Note that ` B ( y ) ` and ` C ( x ) ` may have the displayed free variables. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 27-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: disjxun
blocks.content: The union of two disjoint collections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjxun(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wb(wdisj(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), w3a(wdisj(s0, c0, c2), wdisj(s0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls))))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
